channel.title: Projects on Adam Loy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Adam Loy

item.title: Data Science for Statistics
item.description: Shonda Kuiper, Laura Chihara and I developed a series of tutorials and case studies that can be used in a variety of courses to introduce data-scientific concepts. You can find these materials on Github. This work was funded by grants from the Associated Colleges of the Midwest and the Teagle Foundation.

item.title: lmeresampler: Bootstrapping Clustered Data in R
qqplotr: ggplot2 Compatible Quantile-Quantile plots in R
